name: Sencha
description: I am currently the creative director at Sencha where I help shape the company’s look and feel. This has included renaming/rebranding the company, designing various visual campaigns in both print and web. I also assist on the engineering team, in both designing and building the user interfaces to our products.

name: jQTouch
description: I created jQTouch a few years ago in an effort to create iPhone apps though mobile Safari. Since then, it has grown to become the most popular mobile JavaScript framework in use, and now also includes Android support. I just released a new beta (beta 4) which includes Zepto support and brings the framework under 30kb total.

name: Dyad Communications
description:
I worked for almost 4 years at Dyad Communications, where I eventually became an associate partner, and directed the company’s web projects.

I created sites in both Actionscript 3 and HTML/CSS while at Dyad, mostly working with classical architects and universities.

name: 9-bits
description: 9-bits has been my personal Tumblr blog for several years, where I post the interesting design and technology related things I find.

name: WebKitBits
description: WebKitBits is a tumblog I maintain about WebKit: the browser engine built into Safari, Google Chrome, iOS, Android, and BlackBerry. Between you and me, WebKitBits could use some love…
